consentModal.label: Cookie Consent
consentModal.title: Hello traveller, it's cookie time!
consentModal.description: Our website uses essential cookies to ensure its proper operation and tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The latter will be set only after consent. <button type="button" data-cc="show-preferencesModal" class="cc__link">Manage preferences</button>
